# Malformed URLs Test

Tests handling of URLs that cannot be parsed.

## Valid URLs

Normal URLs [1] work fine.

## Malformed URLs

These have parsing issues but are preserved [2], [3].

## More Valid

Back to normal [4].

[1]: https://example.com/valid
[2]: ht!tp://bad-url
[3]: not-a-url-at-all
[4]: https://example.com/another-valid
